Token.Abstract: The TICDSApplicationSyncManagerDelegate protocol defines the methods implemented by delegates of a TICDSApplicationSyncManager object.
Informs the delegate that the application sync manager has started the application registration process.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the application sync manager paused the application registration process to find out whether to use encryption for this application, because this is the first time this application has been registered.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the application sync manager paused the application registration process because a password is needed to work with this application's encrypted data.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the application sync manager has resumed the application registration process.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the application sync manager failed to register the application because of an error.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: anError
Parameter.Abstract: The error that caused the registration process to fail.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the application sync manager finished registering the application successfully.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the application sync manager has started to check for available documents that have previously been synchronized.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the application sync manager failed to check for available documents that have previously been synchronized.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: anError
Parameter.Abstract: The error that caused the failure.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the application sync manager didn't find any available documents that have previously been synchronized.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the application sync manager found one or more available documents that have previously been synchronized.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: documentsArray
Parameter.Abstract: An array of NSDictionary objects containing information about each available document.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the application sync manager has started to download a requested document that has previously been synchronized.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: anIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: The unique synchronization identifier of the document.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the application sync manager failed to download a requested document because of an error.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: anIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: The unique synchronization identifier of the document.

Parameter.Name: anError
Parameter.Abstract: The error that caused the download to fail.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the application sync manager is about to replace an existing store file on disc with a newly-downloaded file.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: anIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: The unique synchronization identifier of the document.

Parameter.Name: aFileURL
Parameter.Abstract: The location on disc of the existing document that will be replaced.

Token.Abstract: Invoked to request the delegate to return a configured (though not yet registered) document sync manager for a downloaded document.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: anIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: The unique synchronization identifier for the document.

Parameter.Name: aFileURL
Parameter.Abstract: The location on disc of the downloaded document.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The pre-configured, unregistered sync manager for the document.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the application sync manager finished downloading a requested document successfully.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The application sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: anIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: The unique synchronization identifier of the document.

Parameter.Name: aFileURL
Parameter.Abstract: The location of the downloaded store file.
